name: Core API Release 36.2.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you a new feature and an improvement.

ADDED.text: Password Hashing Algorithms now support Argon2i and Argon2id algorithms.
The new disable_login_with_password feature deactivates password login on your website and can be enabled by contacting LoginRadius Support Team.

IMPROVED.text: APIs are updated to align with the newly released Token Types (Magic Link or OTP) that can be independently configured via the Admin Console's Email Templates section.
